name: Caust/ [This is not for you.] split 7" MOSH019
description:
MOSH019
The 19th release on Moshtache Records

Caust / [This is not for you.] Split 7" vinyl.

Caust deliver two frantic, tight as fuck screamo tracks lifted with samples leading into cathartic passionate outbursts.

[This is not for you.] follow suit with a sound heavily influenced by 90s screamo. Heart on sleeve, grindy and in your face- from members of Full of Hell.

2 tracks from each act.

1. Sleep. Meaningless. Reasonless
2. White Worm
3. Ubasute
4. Anton-Babinski Syndrome

300 on green vinyl
200 on black vinyl

This is a co-op release from Moshtache, Middle Man and It's A Trap records.

Listen in full here 
-
http://caustva.bandcamp.com/album/caust-this-is-not-for-you-split

name: "Cover Buzz" - 4 way split 7'' MOSH022 (Let It Die, Pariso, MINE, Svalbard)
description:
The 22nd release on Moshtache Records
MOSH022

LET IT DIE/ PARISO/ MINE/ SVALBARD have formed an alliance to present to the willing masses "Cover Buzz" 7'' 

Released by a coalition of UK independent record labels- Dog Knights Productions/ Cult Culture/ Enjoyment Records/ Moshtache Records/ Tangled Talk Records.
:Release Date Oct 14th

If you ever needed proof of how co-operative and creative UK bands and labels can be than this is surely it!

Made to look and feel like an old Jazz record (for no apparent reason) this is a 'cover versions' 7'' that celebrates Punk, Hardcore and Powerviolence.
Limited to a one time pressing of 250 on Jukebox Vinyl this release shows the strength and diversity displayed by a collective of bands and record labels - friends, fun and music!

Track listing: (Band, Track, Original Artist(s))
Let It Die - War In The Head (7 seconds)
Pariso - Straight Hypocrisy/ Images (Witch Cult/ Weekend Nachos)
Svalbard - This Is The End (Victims)
MINE - Everybody Hates Me (Tear It Up)

Artwork by BearFace

Dog Knights/ Enjoyment/ Cult Culture/ Moshtache/ Tangled Talk 2013

name: Wade - Full Fuck 7'' MOSH021
description:
MOSH021
The 21st release on Moshtache Records

WADE introduce the multi-mood melodies© of FULL FUCK (apologies for the cuss but those Geordie ladz are little scamps) on Pale Green 7'' vinyl


25 Exclusive pre-order versions of the EP are available from Moshtache Records (featuring the 7'' a zine and a print), first come first served... After that the remaining copies of the 7'' will be released.

Track Listing:
1. Ache
2. Wade
3. Stoker
4. Valerian
5. Bones

Good times guaranteed 

Go to http://wadediy.bandcamp.com to hear teaser track 'Valerian'

Artwork by Lee Keith Innes http://leekeith.tumblr.com
This is a co-release with Wolf Town DIY

name: Esoteric Youth - The Burden of Living 7''/ t-shirt MOSH020
description:
MOSH020
The 20th release on Moshtache Records

*This is a pre-order*

 Esoteric Youth - The Burden of Living 7''

After the incredible demo release- which had 2 separate pressings on different labels due to high demand- EY return with the own brand of cathartic metallic hardcore- with flares of crust and grind.
Intelligent hardcore, with lyrics exploring LGBT rights, the commodification of sex workers, depression and how we damage the planet.

The 7" comes on Virgin Black vinyl-
 and is enclosed in an incredible, high quality, heavy weight, 12 page booklet containing writings by Esoteric Youth and artwork by Will Sharp 
(http://grotesquenouveau.tumblr.com)

 limited to a total of 300 copies.

Also available is an Esoteric Youth t-shirt featuring a 'Nosferatu' design by Dia Artio.
Order separately or together with the 7'' for maximum satisfaction. 
This t-shirt is exclusive to this release on Moshtache Records, and will not be reprinted.

Tracklisting:

I. Disease
II. Senicide
III. The Burden of Living
IV. Weltschmerz

"Death is cruelty against the unsuspecting. But that's not what I perceive as cruel. Cruel is when you can't die even if you want to."


This is a co-release between Moshtache Records and Church Of Fuck

name: Pine Barrens - KINGMAKER 12'' Gatefold LP MOSH018
description:
The 18th release on Moshtache Records
MOSH018

PINE BARRENS - KINGMAKER 12''
Presented as a gatefold LP The artwork really is something you have to see in the flesh- superb.

NO pre-order, NO waiting- these are ready to send now!

featuring current/ex-members of Beecher, Atavist, Extinction Of Mankind, The Ergon Carousel, Hammers and Knife Crimes, to name but a few. ‘Kingmaker’ picks up where their 2010 demo left off and delivers a nihilistic mix of black metal, crust, hardcore and grind, proving that you don’t have to be on Southern Lord to fuse genres and create an album that surprises, without sacrificing intensity or integrity.

‘Kingmaker’ was recorded and mixed by Jason Sanderson (Send More Paramedics, Rolo Tomassi, The Ergon Carousel) and mastered at AudioSiege by Brad Boatright (Sleep, Nails, Sunn O))), Tragedy)

This is a co-release between Super-Fi/Art For Blind/Parade Of Spectres/Slow Riot & Moshtache, and will be issued limited to 500 copies.

Full stream currently up on Terrorizer!
http://www.terrorizer.com/2013/07/04/pine-barrens-kingmaker-stream/

name: Cavalcades/Coma Regalia/Heart On My Sleeve 3 way split 10'' MOSH017
description:
The 17th release on Moshtache Records
MOSH017

*Pre-order*
Due to ship ASAP.

Three of the best international screamo bands join forces to present this incredible piece of 10'' vinyl. Cavalcades, Coma Regalia and Heart On My Sleeve - hailing from Scotland, America and Sweden respectively.

The pre-order will run provisionally as an exclusive Red 10'' vinyl, upon release it will also be available to order in Black 10'' vinyl.

2 tracks each of blistering screamo 
Tracklisting:
1.Cavalcades - Distort 
2.Cavalcades - Morning Eyes
3.Coma Regalia - What It Costs 
4.Coma Regalia - What It's Worth
5. Heart On My Sleeve - A Fabrication Of Life
6. Heart On My Sleeve - Petticoat In Ashes

Full stream here!:
http://icorruptrecords.bandcamp.com/album/cavalcades-coma-regalia-heart-on-my-sleeve

name: "MY MOM THINKS I'M COOL" Moshtache Records Baseball shirt.
description:
Prove to the world you're COOL by purchasing the newest item in the fabled line of MOSHTACHE RECORDS merchandise.

An awesome baseball style t-shirt- white body, black sleeves/trim- with a pristine black print screen printed on the front featuring the phrase "MY MOM THINKS I'M COOL". With DIY hand tie-dye effect.  

Currently available in L,XL (you might wanna go a size up from your normal size, as baseball shirts fit slightly differently) Created by our trusted printers VinoSangre.

Please be aware- as is the nature with tie-dye- every design will be different and individual. The picture is just to give you an idea of what to expect.

By buying this item you're supporting the label and helping it grow by putting funds towards our next set of releases- no profit is taken from this (or any other) product.

Original design by xedx, HUGE thanks to Richard Heaven for producing the final image.

options.name: Original Baseball Shirt, white with black print. XL

name: Let It Die / Monolithian Split 7'' MOSH015
description:
MOSH015
The 15th release on Moshtache Records

After both having amazing releases via Moshtache- Let It Die (s/t 7'') and Monolithian (One/Zero 12'') join forces to bring you the heaviest piece of vinyl you will ever bare witness to.

The 7'' comes as Heavyweight 70g plain black vinyl, with a run of 300.

Officially titled:
"Because The World Is Perfidious, I Am Going Into Mourning"

This 7'' really shows off the best of both bands- LID offering the craziest riffs they have ever produced and showing there's no backing down despite dropping from a 4 piece to a 3 piece. Red's vocals are wizard and the two tracks here just go to show why Southern Lord were interested in signing these guys. Volume is definitely up to 11.
Monolithian pick up from the relentless torment of recently released One/Zero which was a double EP presented on 12'' vinyl. This doom laden two piece (yes, there's only two of them) make more noise together than previously thought humanly possible, and show off with ease their crusty/blackened masterpieces.

Tracklisting-
Let It Die:
Boredom/Inertia
Torture
Monolithian:
Emaciate/Euthanise

Full stream up now via. http://TightToTheNail.com

This is a co-release between Moshtache Records and Skin & Bones Records

options.name: Let It Die/ Monolithian and Let It Die s/t 7''
Let It Die/ Monolithian and Monolithian One/Zero 12''
Let It Die/ Monolithian and Let It Die 7'' and Monolithian 12''

name: Pray For Teeth - I'm Still Finding Feathers In My Hair MOSH014
description:
MOSH014
The 14th release on Moshtache Records.

Pray For Teeth - I'm Still Finding Feathers In My Hair 7'' 

Exclusive UK press
on beautiful GOLD vinyl /100

Incredible atmospheric screamo from Pittsburgh PA.


2 tracks @
http://prayforteeth.bandcamp.com/

Paper Courage/Heavy Restless

Released with It's A Trap Records and Root Of Evil Collective.

name: Cerce - s/t 7'' MOSH013
description:
MOSH013
The 13th release on Moshtache Records


Cerce - Self Titled 7''

Exclusive UK press on beautiful clear blue vinyl /100

Female fronted screamo - the most exciting band of 2012.
The second press of this EP. Also available through Solidarity, Deathwish and previously It's A Trap.

Released with Unfun Records.

Comes with exclusive screen printed recycled card cover via VinoSangre.

Free download code included w/ the vinyl.

http://cerce.bandcamp.com/album/cerce

name: Let It Die - Let It Die 7'' MOSH012
description:
MOSH012
The 12th release on Moshtache Records.

Let It Die bring to you their first ever vinyl release, following on from the huge success of their demo come 6 blistering tracks of dark hardcore/ metal.
Clear purple vinyl with a fold out insert, art by Ben Foot. Ltd to 300 copies.

Originally set for release on the mighty Southern Lord, who unfortunately couldn't see it through due to over loading themselves with releases.
But Moshtache Records is more than happy to pick this one up. Listen below and you'll see why!

Full stream here:
http://letitdie.bandcamp.com

Free download code included with every vinyl.

name: Monolithian - One/Zero 12'' MOSH011
description:
MOSH011
The 11th release on Moshtache Records

The The long awaited debut LP from the two piece Doom behemoths Monolithian.

For the first time on vinyl you can experience the heaviest thing to ever come out of the South West, destroying crowds at every show they play. 
Monolithian present this as a double EP, side A is 'One' side B is 'Zero'. Printed on pristine 'Frosted Clear' 12'' vinyl.

http://monolithiandoom.bandcamp.com for full stream!

Co-released with Church Of Fuck, Bitter North, Riotous Outburst, Atomsmasher.

name: Gay For Johnny Depp - Blood: The Natural Lubricant 10'' MOSH009
description:
MOSH009
The 9th release on Moshtache Records 

Oh, the Horror of it all.

Ladies and Gentlemen, Boys and Girls, Comrades and Compatriots - the Gay For Johnny Depp are pleased as punch to announce the reissue of their beloved EP - Blood: The Natural Lubricant (an Apocalyptic Adventure Beyond Sodom and Gomorrah)

Available for the very first time ever on cool cool vinyl, after being out of press and unavailable for several years.

Prepare yourselves as they whip out their 10'' and beat you into a frenzy with it's two limited variants.

'Blood' Red limited to 100 copies and 'Cumsplatter' White limited to 200.

With all new meticulously extended linear notes and song by song (aka blow by blow) recording comments from your favorite well dressed boi, Sid Jagger.

Available on pre-order, only through Moshtache Records, on everyones favourite holiday- The Fourth of July- forever to be know as 'Independene Gay' from this day forward."


Get Happy, Very.



 http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jrlkKIxynCw

name: No Fun - Bad News 7'' MOSH008
description:
MOSH008
The 8th release on Moshtache Records.

No Fun - Bad News EP
The band's first time on vinyl.
Following their well received demo cassette (also on Moshtache) Norwich's young punx return with four new tracks of anti-social fastcore.

tracks:
1. Intro (Little Hell)
2. Guidless Ghost, Hopeless Hoax
3. I Refuse
4. Bitter Old Man


FFO: Minor Threat, Void, Converge, Throats, Napalm Death.
Recorded By Matt and Alfie of MATHS.


A co-release between Moshtache Records, DSTM & Dead Chemists.

name: As We Sink - Ventures 7'' MOSH007
description:
MOSH007
The 7th release on Moshtache Records

As We Sink like their friends and sing-alongs.

'Ventures' the new 7' EP from the South West based punk rock band.
4 new tracks of fun but thoughtful goodness.

Purple vinyl /250 with full colour print inner & outer sleeves.
Original artwork by Tom Lacy (The Ghost Of A Thousand)
Recorded by Jag Jago, Mastered by Alan Douches.

Free digital download included in your order! 
(download code will be sent with the vinyl)


Tracks:
1. Bitter Teeth
2. Drifter
3. Aching Hands, Itchy Feet
4. Most Important Days

FFO: A Wilhelm Scream, Make Do And Mend, Bangers, Title Fight.

aswesink.bandcamp.com

name: Black Veins - ...and Hell Followed cassette MOSH006
description:
The 6th(66) release on Moshtache Records.

Black Veins - ...and Hell Followed.
Originally released via Witch Hunter Records on CD.

Now available on limited white cassette tapes /50 with new artwork from Bite Radius Design and Pete Stanley.

5 tracks of punishing dark hardcore

1 - Nihilism 02:09 
2 - ... And Hell Followed 02:24 
3 - Death Crown 02:50 
4 - The Harvest 01:34 
5 - Suffer 02:19

FFO: Throats, Converge, Trap Them.

name: HARKER - Loyal Than Most/ Lights Off CD MOSH005
description:
MOSH005
The 5th release on Moshtache Records

3 tracks of gruff acoustic punk rock.

Harker - the acoustic alter-ego of Three Summers Strong frontman Mark Boniface

Double artwork screen printed on stumptown recycled card cases. (VinoSangre)
Full art coverage professionally made CDs with inserts and free screen printed fabric patch. 
Hand numbered /50

1. Loyal Than Most
2. Lights Off
3. Do You Still Hate Me? (Jawbreaker cover)

Listen to the tracks here:
http://harker.bandcamp.com/

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZmPnWS-kIwU&feature=plcp

name: Jackals/Grazes split 7' MOSH004
description:
MOSH004
The 4th release on Moshtache Records.

The new split from Norwich heavy weights Jackals and your new favourite band- Sheffield's Grazes.

3 tracks from each available on translucent green /200 and translucent purple /300.
(Jackals side features a sick Minor Threat cover)

Some of the best hardcore punk the UK has to offer.

So stoked to be on this release.

description:
*use the drop down to make a selection*

The Pact - Demo Cassette. Awesome new hardcore band, featuring ex-Grazes.

Caust - Mass Graves & Page Turner on cassettes.
Very exciting screamo from Richmond VA.

I Don't Want To Know Why The Caged Bird Sings/ Cassus split cassette. 
Passionate young screamo.

Attack! Vipers! - Deadweight Revival CD

GWC - Geeks With Charvals EP. Dirty Hardcore from Liverpool

Monolithian - One, EP. 4 tracks of Doom / Thrash.

name: ZINE DISTRO
description:
*use drop down menu to select*

WOLF MASK Boredom & Coffee zine issue 4
Sick artwork from some gnarly Scottish dude.

Crushed Knuckle Zine  #2
Great new (low priced) zine from the crew behind WTS? Records.
Interviews/ album/gig reviews.

A Short Fanzine About Rocking- issue 34
-Huge zine with band interviews, tonnes of reviews and rants. Must have item.

name: Dads - American Radass 12'' MOSH016
description:
The 16th release on Moshtache Records
MOSH016

Dads - American Radass (This Is Important) European press 12'' Vinyl.

An exclusive European edition press.
With amazing all new artwork by Lee Keith Innes.

Available in Classic Black and Sweet Leaf Green vinyl- each limited to 150 copies.

Dads are a two piece indie/emo/punk band originally from New Jersey, now- always on tour.
Their first LP, due to popular demand, is now available in Europe and UK.
This is a split release between Moshtache/Get Into It/Day By Day/Something New Records.

Tracklisting:
1. If Your Song Title Has The Word "Beach" In It, I'm Not Listening To It.
2. Get to the Beach!
3. Honestly, Chroma Q&A.
4. Aww, C'mon Guyz.
5. Shit Twins.
6. Grunt Work (The '69 Sound) 
7. Groin Twerk.
8. Big Bag of Sandwiches.
9. Bakefast at Piffany's.
10. Heavy to the Touch (think about tonight, forget about tomorrow)


Listen here:
http://dadsnj.bandcamp.com/album/american-radass-this-is-important
